result.execSummary:
The defendant Jude W. Giles was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case.

  • Possession of THC, an unclassified misdemeanor, Wisconsin Statutes 961.41(3g)(e).

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

judgments.action: Guilty Due to No Contest Plea

charges.dispoDesc: Guilty Due to No Contest Plea

result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Jude W. Giles

defendant.name: Giles, Jude W.
defendant.address: PO Box 1550, c/o Koinonia, Rhinelander, WI 54501

records.descr: Records of prosec. are converted data. See file.

records.addlTxt: Review hearing on August 15, 2016 at 03:00 pm.

ADDRESS INFO for Jude W. Giles
Current: PO Box 1550, c/o Koinonia, Rhinelander, WI 54501   (Effective: 06-01-2015)
Prior: 908 Dorr Avenue, Rhinelander, WI 54501

3:04 p.m. Defendant Jude W. Giles in court, via video, in custody. Court recites record. Defendant states he can pay in full today-will call his family and have it paid within 24 hours. Defendant statement that revocation hearing is 5/31/16. Adj. 3:06 p.m.  Review hearing scheduled for June 20, 2016 at 03:00 pm.
Voluntary appearance - warrant issued but not delivered to Sheriff

1:36 p.m. Defendant Jude W. Giles in court. Court quashes warrant - issued but not delivered to Sheriff.  Defendant does not have any money but has proof of current financial problems. Defendant states he is owed $10,000 from builders; anticipates a payment in April. Adj. 1:40 p.m.  Review hearing scheduled for May 16, 2016 at 03:00 pm.
No appearance or payment of fine, court orders warrant

Defendant Jude W. Giles in court with attorney Anne M. Katte.  Steven Mitchell Michlig appeared for the State of Wisconsin.
4:07 
Calling 15cm214 abd 15cm228 and 15tr1379
State moves to dismiss 15cm228 and 15tr1379 - Granted - Plea questionnaire filed- No contest plea to 15cm214 -   Court reads on waiver of rights and tendering plea. Waiver free and voluntary. Court finds that a factual basis for the plea exists and finds defendant guilty
Michlig/Katte/Court statement to sentencing - Court imposes fine of $ 379 plus $200 DNA surcharge -    payment plan paperwork given to defendant - Defendant must submit DNA sample at Sheriff's Department 
Appeal rights given -  The court informs defendant of right to request expungement of the DNA under Wis. Stat. 165.77(4).  Review hearing scheduled for January 4, 2016 at 03:00 pm.
States Reply to Discovery  and State's Demand for Discovery

2:03 p.m Defendant Jude W. Giles in court with attorney Anne M. Katte.  Steven Mitchell Michlig appeared for the State of Wisconsin. Calling 15cm228, 15cm214 and 15tr1379.   In receipt of complaint, waive reading - not guilty plea. 
Bail continued. Adj. 2:07 p.m.  Pre-trial conference scheduled for September 29, 2015 at 03:30 pm.

04:48 p.m.Defendant Jude W. Giles in court.  Michael William Schiek appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Calling 15cm228 (AIA), 15cm214 and 15tr1379.  Email rec'd from PD's office indicating defendant came to PD's office yesterday; however they were unable to appoint someone for today due to the short notice.  Defendant states had not realized had court this week until he heard from family reminding him so immediately contacted PD's office.  Bail continued.  Adjourned 04:53 p.m.  Adjourned initial appearance scheduled for August 3, 2015 at 02:30 pm.

02:54 pm - Defendant Jude W. Giles in court.  Steven Mitchell Michlig appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Court questions defendant as to obtaining counsel.  Defendant states has not attempted to obtain counsel.  Michlig is not prepared to settle case at this time.  Defendant wishes to proceed on own.  Court will not take waiver of counsel on today's date.  Defendant has not read complaint.  Court adjourns.  Bail continued.  Pre-trial conference scheduled for July 28, 2015 at 03:30 pm.

Defendant Jude W. Giles in court, via video  in custody.  Steven Mitchell Michlig appeared for the State of Wisconsin.
1:37
Complaint to be faxed, right to counsel - will seek counsel/PD
Michlig to bail - on PO Hold- Court sets $ sig bond -  Adjourned initial appearance scheduled for June 8, 2015 at 02:30 pm.
